how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Gently massage two pumps of cleansing oil into dry skin to thoroughly remove excess oils and makeup. Emulsify by adding water, then rinse with lukewarm water. .-Message two pumps of cleansing foam into damp skin to remove remaining impurities. Rinse with lukewarm water..-After your cleansing ritual, apply three pumps of First Care Activating Serum to damp skin with your fingertips and press into skin for increased absorption. .-As the final step of your skincare routine, warm Concentrated Ginseng Renewing Cream between your fingertips and gently press into the skin.

reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like these products, but on the whole I would say I was disappointed. The foaming cleanser I find drying, and leaves me with a rash on my neck. The oil cleanser is fine, though I find double cleansing with the oil and foam doesn't really yield significant results. The Serum made me break out and feel greasy, and the moisturizer is pretty meh. Overall, for the price point, I found these products disappointing.

The mini size of the serum is $25. The mini of the cream is $52. In this set you get the size as the mini serum. And a jar of cream this is half the size of the mini. You also get a foaming and a oil cleanser.

I received the set as a free sample thinking it would be perfect for travel but when I used it my skin broke out into white heads not to mention that my skin completely dried out and started flaking off. I would not recommend using this if you have dry or sensitive skin.

I received this sample kit with one of my normal purchases from Sephora. I don't normally switch my skincare routine, but the reviews looked great, so I figured I would give it a shot. The first 2 days I used it, I was pleasantly surprised, as my skin looked great and was glowing. The 3rd day, I woke up to a weird sore above my lip. Was not a pimple, it almost looked like a scab. Throughout the day, I noticed 2 more by my ear...then my forehead...and by day 4, my entire face was covered in open sores. My skin does not break out, even after using new products, and if I do get the occasional pimple, it's gone within a day. This was a full blown bacterial infection. After going to the doctor and getting prescribed an oral antibiotic and a topical cream because they determined it was from this new skincare, a week later I am still having new sores pop up and now have to go to my local dermatologist for laser treatments, as I am afraid these will scar. I don't know if the sample packs were contaminated, but this was the WORST experience I have had with a new skincare, and now am having to spend money on doctors, medicine, and possible future treatments because of the facial infection it caused. Just beware to do a test spot before you use all over your face in case you have a reaction similar to mine. So disappointed and embarrassed by my skin right now.
After two weeks I noticed a huge difference with the fine lines on my face! My face is glowing!! I am ao happy! Definitely going to buy the full size!
I havenu2019t used this yet, but the face cleanser wasnu2019t included. Very disappointed. Was looking forward to trying that as well
After two weeks I noticed a huge difference with the fine lines on my face! My face is glowing!! I am ao happy! Definitely going to buy the full size!
This trial kit has been my go-to gift.  It's a great way to introduce your loved ones to this wonderful brand!

After just a few days using this regimen, I have blackheads and the like popping up all over my face. It does make my skin look u201cglowy,u201d but thatu2019s actually because itu2019s greasy, not hydrated. My skin isnu2019t terribly sensitive, Iu2019m not prone to breakouts at all, and my skin is fairly dry, but this made my face feel like an oil slick.

reviews.review_title: Great product to add to your skin routine
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using these products for about two weeks and loving the results. Leaving skin feeling fresh, hydrated and glowing. Great way you try a product before purchasing the full glam. I will repurchase!

Don't buy this, the ingredients on the box are different than the original first care serum and different than the ingredients shown in this listing. the second ingredient is denatured alcohol, the kind that drys your skin out. it isn't bad in small amount but since its the second ingredient it has a large amount.
I really love this brand, they have wonderful products, the facial cleansers are simply wonderful, they donu2019t dry out or overtighten the skin, I ordered again and will order again
I love the first care activating serum. I received it initially as a free offer with another purchase and liked so much I purchased this kit. The activating serum size was larger than expected.

This kit allows you to sample a full Sulwhasoo routine to understand how the products work with one another to deliver optimal results.  The first part of my double cleanse is the gentle cleansing oil, which is powerful enough to thoroughly remove waterproof makeup yet rinses off without leaving behind any oily residue.  The second part of my double cleanse is the gentle cleansing foam, which lathers up lightly and makes my face feel clean but not stripped of moisture.  I then go in with the first care activating serum, which has a thin, liquid consistency and gives my skin an immediate boost of radiance.  I end with the concentrated ginseng renewing cream, which I would consider more of a gel cream, and it leaves my skin feeling soft, smooth, and nourished without feeling heavy or greasy.  These products have natural scents that are a blend of their floral and herbal ingredients.  When used all together, this set makes my skin look hydrated and dewy.

Okay, Iu2019m sorry to say this, but I donu2019t think this kit is anything special. I have products that do the exact same things but a much better job. I hate to leave this review, but this is definitely more of a gift set for someone who really loves the brand or maybe someone who is just starting a basic skin care routine.

This set is such a good value! The items are a luxurious mix of creams, cleanser and treatments. Iu2019ve never tried this brand before as it was a little out of my budget however I was so excited to try this set to see how it did with my dry skin. I was pleasantly surprised how gentle the cleanser was and how it didnu2019t over dry my skin. The moisturizer soaked nicely into my face and kept it supple all day allowing my makeup to glide on top nicely. My skin was looking nice and radiant and Iu2019m so excited to continue using this.

reviews.review_title: Great products, packaging not so good
reviews.review_text: This body oil is so good! It leaves my skin silky soft and slightly scented with roses. Absolutely beautiful! Iu2019ve been using it for a week now and love how smooth it made my skin feel. Itu2019s definitely a staple in my body routine forever!

reviews.review_title: The best thing youu2019ll ever try
reviews.review_text: Great skincare I suggest anyone should try this magic product at least once !!!! This is such a perfect intro set and was great for my redness and sensitivity! Iu2019ve seen big improvements on my skin since I first used these products, both AM and PM ..  This has been, by far, my favorite skin care routine. It helped me with my laugh lines and the texture of my skin has become smoother and softer to touch.

The Sulwhasoo First Care Trial Kit contains four skincare products that nourish, hydrate, and rejuvenate your skin. Here are my honest reviews: First Care Activating Serum: A lightweight serum that enhances other skincare products. It has JAUM Balancing Complex, a blend of five Korean herbs that balance, nourish, and revitalize the skin. It makes my skin soft, smooth, and radiant. It has a relaxing herbal scent. I use it every morning and night after cleansing and toning. Gentle Cleansing Oil: A gentle cleansing oil that removes makeup, dirt, and impurities. It has apricot kernel oil and tangerine peel extract that moisturize and brighten the skin. It has a refreshing citrus scent. I use it as the first step of my double cleansing at night. It cleans and softens my skin. Gentle Cleansing Foam: A mild cleansing foam that cleanses without drying the skin. It has duckweed and chestnut shell extracts that calm and smooth the skin. It has a creamy texture and a pleasant floral scent. I use it as the second step of my double cleansing at night. It lathers and rinses well. It leaves my skin fresh and comfortable. Concentrated Ginseng Renewing Cream: A rich moisturizing cream that nourishes and repairs the skin. It has red ginseng extract and ginseng oil that stimulate collagen, improve elasticity, and reduce wrinkles. It has a luxurious texture and a warm ginseng scent. I use it as the last step of my skincare at night. It hydrates and plumps up my skin overnight. It makes my skin youthful and glowing in the morning. I love the Sulwhasoo First Care Trial Kit. It is a great way to try some of their best-selling products and see their benefits for your skin.

Wow so impressed with this set from Sulwhasoo has been so good to my complexion. I have been using this set for the last couple of weeks and I have seen improvements with my skin being more hydrated and firmer. I like that it comes with a four step routine too.

truly exceeded my expectations. It's a comprehensive collection of products that have noticeably improved the texture and appearance of my skin. I couldn't be happier with the results, and I highly recommend this set for anyone looking to achieve radiant and healthy skin.

reviews.review_title: Amazing kit! Perfect gift for skincare lovers!
reviews.review_text: This is the best kit to gift to the skincare lover in your life or for yourself to experience the luxury skincare products that Sulwhasoo provides! I love the sizes of these and they feel amazing on my skin! I am obsessed with them and think that this is the perfect kit to get you started in the Sulwhasoo luxury product line!

Iu2019m In obsessed with this kit! These have now become a staple in my routine. The products apply and sink into my skin and provide great hydration without any irritation and actually makes them feel moisturized longer throughout the day. Iu2019ve noticed my fine lines seem less noticeable.

I have tried the gentle foaming cleanser in the past and loved it so when I saw this set, I was very excited. I love that it includes a nice oil cleaner as well. The first care serum is very lightweight and absorbs quickly. The moisturizer was lightweight as well but very hydrating.  The gentle cleanser is amazing and I love the way each product makes my skin feel.

reviews.review_title: A Great Way to Explore Sulwhasoo
reviews.review_text: If you're new to Sulwhassoo skincare and want to try it out without breaking the bank, the Sulwhassoo First Care Trial Kit is a great option. This kit provides a broad range of products that allow you to test and experience the brand's quality. The set includes a uniquely sized 30 ml bottle of the First Care Activating Serum, exclusively available in this kit. The serum in this kit is very light and quickly absorbs into the skin, giving it a soft glow without any texture or tackiness. When initially applied, there is a floral scent, but it quickly fades and isn't overwhelming.  The cleansing oil is my second favorite product in this kit, as it not only effortlessly removes makeup but also makes my skin feel incredibly soft afterwards. There is a decent herbal scent when working it in, but it's not too strong. The Cleansing Foam also works great at providing a thorough cleanse, whether or not you're wearing makeup. The citrusy herbal scent of this product is the most intense when compared to all four in the kit.  My favorite product, hands down, is the Renewing Cream. It has a rich, creamy texture and applies like a hydration dream, making my skin feel silky soft without being too much for my combination skin. The scent is the most unique since it smells earthy, with a little tinge of unpleasantness, but nothing that would stop me from using it. After a week of use, I've noticed my aging combination skin feels wonderful. Though Sulwhassoo products can be pricey, this trial kit offers great value for those looking to explore the brand.

This is a great little set! Perfect for travel, since everything is small enough for your carry on. Or if youu2019re like me, the perfect set to finally try some of the Sulwhasoo products youu2019ve been coveting! The two cleansing steps feel amazing and fresh, but not drying. And the First Care serum (the largest item in the set) along with the Renewing Cream both feel wonderful and luxurious on the skin, with a lovely herbal scent thatu2019s not at all perfume-y.   This would also be a great gift option for anyone whose interested in establishing a skincare routine or who loves to try anything and everything luxury skincare!

I've noticed significant enhancements in my skin ever since I began using these products, using them in both the morning and evening routines (with the exception of the cream, which I reserve for the evening because I use a moisturizer with SPF during the day). It does take a little while for the products to fully absorb, but as long as you're patient and aware, it shouldn't be a concern. My fine lines have shown improvement, but I'm still undecided about their impact on my pores. For more information, please read my detailed review on this fantastic skincare regimen that I believe everyone should consider trying.

This is a beautiful way to try this brand I absolutely love the cleanse it so gently the moisturizer feels very hydrated but my most favorite is the eye cream is absolutely the best for my tired under eyes .

This first trial kit by Sulwhasoo has a nice mixture of skincare products, and itu2019s nicely packaged. It includes both a cleansing oil and cleansing foam that work well together to leave skin feeling clean. My favorite product is probably the serum, which is thin (but not watery) and absorbs easily into the skin, leaving it feel immediately softer and hydrated. It also has a very pleasant elegant fragrance that seems somewhat citrusy and floral. The ginseng cream sample is quite small, but itu2019s enough to try it for long enough to get a sense of the product. I like it, but it is on the heavier side for me. As a result, I only use it in the evening or if my skin is feeling especially dry. With my daytime routine, it feels a little too heavy to wear under my makeup though. It is very moisturizing, and even the small sample packaging is attractive. The fragrance is on the strong side, but I personally like the herbally ginseng scent that it has. A great kit to try out Sulwhasoo products!

reviews.review_title: Nice set to try different things out
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed trying all 4 of these products. The oil cleanser was a little different than what Iu2019m used to using as it doesnu2019t lather up, but it seemed to do a good job removing my makeup. The cleansing foam is more like a traditional cleanser and it lathers up well and left my face feeling clean and smooth. The activating serum absorbed and dried quickly and felt very lightweight on my skin and hydrating too. The cleansers and the serum all smelled fantastic too, they have a light citrus fragrance to them. I didnu2019t notice a difference in how my skin looked overall after using the renewing cream. The activating serum is definitely my favorite item out of the set, so I was happy that itu2019s also the largest sized item too.

This would be a really nice gift set to give to someone that into skin care for Christmas! It comes with 2 gentle cleansers (1 oil 1 foam) and then an activation serum and moisturizer. High quality products.

This kit from Sulwhasoo skincare has to be one of the best facial kits that I have used. My skin tends to be trick, in the summer I deal with oily skin and now that itu2019s getting colder my skin is very dry. I have fine lines and wrinkles and larger pores, so trying to find products that work for my skin type are a hassle. This kit I have been using for a month now and I am so pleased with my results. The kit comes with a serum, cleansing oil, cleansing foam, and a renewing cream so you have everything you need for your face. Since using these products my skin is so much more softer, healthier look & feeling. My skin is more radiant. My fine lines are minimal. My skin looks so much better than it did a month ago. I highly recommend this kit if you need an excellent skin care routine.

A stunning gift set! Sulwhasoo sets make amazing gifts and are perfect introduction to the brand. This serum is a full size which is amazing. This serum is one of my favorites, my skin feels so hydrated and dewy when I use it and the new packaging is so chic. The ginseng cream and the cleansers are smaller travel sizes, enough to try a few times and figure out if you like them or not.

This is by far the most luxe skin care discovery kit I have ever used! Itu2019s also my first time trying Sulwhasoo - and wow I am super impressed by the high quality ingredients and efficacy. Though all four items are great, the First Care Activating Serum was incredible and really boosted radiance and firmness. The real star was the Concentrated Ginseng cream though. WOW. My skin has truly never looked more healthy and well-hydrated, let alone felt velvety and super smooth. Will absolutely be adding the full-size to my holiday wishlist. This discovery set is a great way to get introduced to the brand and would make a lovely gift.

My skin truly felt amazing after using this. It felt so healthy & clean. My skin looked great with or without make up. It was very moisturizing but didnu2019t leave my skin feeling oily or greasy. I will definitely be purchasing in the future.

Thank you to sulwahsoo for letting me try your first care trial kit! I really like how it comes with all of the products to use for a full skin care routine! I started with the gentle cleansing oil, to start to remove anything in my face, then the gentle cleansing foam for a deeper clean, then the activating serum, which was lovely, and finally the renewing cream to help keep your skin hydrated!

This trial kit was so fun to try a whole range of products from Sulwhasoo. The first step is a gentle cleansing oil that took off all my makeup. Next up is the gentle cleansing foam that really cleaned my skin. Third was the activating serum that moisturized my skin nicely. Last was renewing cream that really woke up my skin and made it nice and bright.

This skincare set is one of my favorites! All the products absorb so nicely and feel so hydrating and nourishing on the skin. After use, my skin looks glowy, radiant, and fine lines are reduced. This would be a great gift!

I love this skincare kit! It has a cleansing oil, a face wash, a serum and a cream. Itu2019s a great way to try out this brand and a little bit of the product goes a long way so I feel like this is enough to really see if you like the products or not.

This product has helped me with my skin imperfections and has helped me with fine lines in my face. I am a very expressive person so this product has been life saving. They didnu2019t burn or irritate my skin. My skin felt hydrated and clean. Thereu2019s no sticky residue leftover and it absorbs very well.

I think this is the best kit to try sulwhasoo skin care. I follow the exact steps when applying the products. It makes my skin so so soft after using from the first time. It feels hydrated as well. Itu2019s perfect!

Such a beneficial trail kit! I love what these potent Asian skin care achieves for my skin. Itu2019s delivered potent hydration and brightening clarity. Truly the holy grail of Korean skin care . Invest in your skin always.

This is a good starter kit to start with for first time trial. Their best serum is in the kit and the bottle is bigger than I thought which I liked. I liked all the products in the kit. But especially the serum and cream were so good. It made my skin soft, smooth and hydrated. Highly recommend.

This is an awesome trial kit! The sizes are pretty solid so you can get multiple uses out of the products and really see how you like them. They made my skin feel refreshed and really hydrated, and these are perfect to take on the go.

I was so exited to try out this kit! I have seen so many good things about the brand. The cleansing oil feels so hydrating on my skin and the cleansing foam is perfect for my dry skin. It has made me skin feel so much better and I can really see a glowy difference in my skin. I love this kit! I will be getting full sizes for sure. This product is amazing.

This is such a cute gift set to give for the holidays. The oil was great at removing makeup and the cleansing foam made me feel really clean after. The serum felt like it melted into my skin and made it nice and hydrated. The cream was good, nothing amazing but it got the job done. Overall this was a great introduction for me to this brand and I really enjoyed the set.

THEEEE best kit to ever exist, it makes me feel rich and expensive whenever I travel because the quality is so BOMB And I love that you can take it anywhere with you because they are the perfect size !!

This trial kit is beautiful and is an amazing way to test out the brand. This kit has made me fall in love with the brand I love the serum and facial cream they feel so hydrating and luxurious on the skin and have shown visible hydration results

Sulwhasoo's First Care Trial Kit contains a complete introductory skincare set. I have combination skin for reference. The Gentle Cleansing Oil easily removed the day's debris from my face with ease. The product felt light after applying it. Next, the Gentle Cleansing Foam produced a lot of lather with the smallest amount of cleanser. It was easy to rinse it off completely. My skin felt clean and still hydrated. The First Care Activating Serum has a ginseng scent, and the texture is lightweight glycerin gel. It dried down a little tacky but that helped in layering the Concentrated Ginseng Renewing Cream. The cream is a great sealant to lock in the other product and provided hydration and plumping that I could feel and see the next morning. I did have a few breakouts initially but my skin adjusted on the fourth day. I really like this set.

This is the perfect gift set to try all the different Suhwhasoo products since the full size is really expensive. I love the size for travel as well. The trial sized items are well made and give you a nice trial. I found the items to work pretty well with my skin and didn't leave it irritated at all.

This set has a decent value given that you get a relatively large amount of the serum. The other three items in the set are pretty small, but would be great for traveling! I think Sephora currently has these as a complimentary gift if you order $85 worth of Sulwhasoo products. If you can grab this gift, Iu2019d say itu2019s definitely worth it and would make a cute gift for someone.

This first care trial set from sulwhasoo is such a lovely set. it has a cleanse, prep, hydrate and firm product, in a deluxe sample size of each. I love that I can pack it with me on trips! My skin feels so good after using these!

The serum is absolutely fantastic. I'm fond of its subtle ginger scent. Initially, it felt slightly sticky on my face, but it quickly absorbed, leaving no residue behind. If I had to suggest an improvement, it would be to package it in a sturdy box to enhance its gift appeal.

Despite being a trial kit, I've noticed that the serum lasts for a long time because it's incredibly spreadable and lightweight. The subtle ginseng scent is truly delightful. I also appreciate the cream, although I wish its fragrance was a bit lighter

reviews.review_title: A great way to try the brand
reviews.review_text: This affordable kit is designed to offer a sample of the Sulwhasoo skincare ritual. Sulwhasoo products, in my experience, balance gentleness with effectiveness and highlight quality ingredients. This kit isnu2019t large enough to see long-term effects, but is certainly enough to experience the softening and brightening that appear more quickly. I have used the brandu2019s First Care Activating Serum (the largest of the samples in this kit) in the past, and with consistent use have seen improvement to my skin barrier, better hydration, and softer skin. The kitu2019s hero ingredient is the Sulwhasoo Master Complex, which is a combination of herbal ingredients and ginseng that supports skin health. Also highlighted is Ginsenomics, which is an active concentration of ginseng saponin that is claimed to improve the look of wrinkles. This Set includes the following: - 1 oz/ 30 mL First Care Activating Serum (see above) - 0.84 oz/ 25 mL Gentle Cleansing Oil: a deep cleansing oil that is just the right weight and feels luxurious on the skin. - 0.84 oz/ 25 mL Gentle Cleansing Foam a second-step or solo cleanser that is gentle and brightening. - 0.16 oz/ 5 mL Concentrated Ginseng Renewing Cream is an anti-aging cream that feels silky smooth and absorbs fabulously into the skin. It also has a gorgeous scent that is a little invigorating and spicy.

I have used this set a few times and really like all the products. They all have a subtle pleasant scent thatu2019s not overpowering. It consists of the cleansing oil, cleansing foam, serum and a cream and have to be applied in that order to receive the best results too. The oil is very helpful in removing makeup, except for on the eyes. Avoid using it on the eyes because it really really stings.  The cleansing foam is the second part of the double cleansing and remove all residual dirt and makeup. I use it without the oil sometimes and it does a really good job even by itself. My skin feels clean and it doesnu2019t dry it. I apply the serum next. It isnu2019t too thick, nor too thin but blends well in my skin and gives it a smooth hydrated feel which Iu2019m really getting used to. The ginseng cream is the last one. It comes in a small bottle but a little goes a long way so you donu2019t have to apply too much. It doesnu2019t feel thick and heavy on my skin so I like applying it just as much as the serum. My skin feels refreshed and taken care of with these products and I enjoy using them specially knowing that they donu2019t have the products that are generally known to be unhealthy for my skin.  All in all, itu2019s a good set that gives you a chance to try out their hit products and letu2019s you choose which ones you want to buy again and if they suit your skin at all. The packaging is beautiful and luxurious and it can make for a lovely gift to someone who enjoys skincare.

i am loving this sulwhasoo kit. the whole skincare routine makes my skin look so smooth and radiant. i love it so much and i will be buying the full size products. the serum is especially good, so moisturizing but light.

The fourth and final step is the highly concentrated ginseng renewing cream that helps to rejuvenate skin and addresses visible signs of aging.  I love every product in this kit. reviews.review_title: Wow this is a fantastic trial kit
reviews.review_text: Wow this kit has all the essentials. Iu2019ve always heard about double cleansing but have never tried it . The gentle cleansing oil removed all my makeup even waterproof eye makeup , then followed by the foam which made my skin feel super clean but not dried out. My favorite product in this kit is definitely the activating serum. I put it on while my skin was a little damp and it absorbed easily and my skin feels super plump and hydrated. The ginseng cream is also nice and lightweight and smells amazing. This kit is the best .

This trial set is such a fantastic way to try out one of my favorite brands of all time. I was surprised upon opening as for some reason, I couldn't imagine the first treatment serum would be the size it is in this kit. It's actually one fluid ounce - the same size as most western serums! I am including a picture of the size in the kit next to the full size to really illustrate the value here.  The set includes minis of the cleansing oil and cleanser, which are both perfect for double cleansing as well as a lovely sensory experience. The ginseng cream is also included in a mini (another personal favorite)  And finally, as a skincare enthusiast myself, I want to take a moment to say what I believe stands out in this brand as well as the included products. Sulwhasoo is a research-focused brand, particularly focused on ginseng. Initially, I struggled to make sense of the ingredients lists (as a Westerner focused more on our strong actives). Over time, I realized that Sulwhasoo uses TCM herbs and goes above and beyond to isolate the active constituents found in these herbs. This is the meaning of enzyme-treated ginseng saponins, for example. It's a completely different approach to skincare, and for me, one that has proven itself in terms of results. These products revealed a brighter, more even skintone for me, and I believe they will for others as well.

Sulwhasoo's First Care Trial Kit is the perfect way to try out four wonderful products. I have been trying to branch out and really take care of my skin. I am so impressed with this kit. I had never used a cleansing oil before and was amazed by how gentle this was on my skin. The gentle cleansing foam cleaned my skin without drying me out. The two holy grails in this kit were the First Care Activating Serum and the Concentrated Ginseng Moisturizer. My skin was left feeling soft, moisturized, firm, and more even. I am incredibly happy with how quickly I am receiving results. I most definitely recommend.

Love this set! My skin feels so clean after using both the Gentle Cleansing Oil and Gentle Cleansing Foam. It cleans really well without drying out my skin. My favorite is the First Care Activating Serum. It feels really nice on the skin and makes my skin so soft and hydrated! The Concentrated Ginseng Renewing Cream VI is just the cherry on top! A wonderful last step to this set. It adds just the right amount of hydration without feeling too heavy. Overall, I really enjoyed this set and will be a staple in my skin care routine.

I received this skincare kit complementary from Sulwhasoo in exchange for my honest review. It was my first time trying line from this Korean company and I have to admit I really love it. The Sulwhasoo First Care Trial Set is a good way to try the Sulwhasoo line for the first time. The set includes 4 trial sized products which can serve as a full nighttime skincare regimen. Given the high price point of Sulwhasoo, itu2019s a great way to see if you like this brand before splurging on a full sized product. Itu2019s also packaged beautifully, ready for gifting. This set includes: - Gentle Cleansing Oil- removes waterproof makeup - Gentle Cleansing Foam - removes debris and dirt while keeping skin hydrated - First Care Activating Serum - hydrates and strengthens skin barrier. At 30ml, this serum is a fairly large size for a trial! - Concentrated Ginseng Renewal Cream - Moisturizes and firms skin The key ingredient in this set is ginseng, a powerful herbal ingredient, to help address signs of aging and improve skin barrier. Ginseng has many skincare benefits including reducing wrinkles, improving elasticity, brightening skin, reducing puffiness, encouraging collagen production. After trying this set just for a day, I can tell that I already love this line! The serum and moisturizer are standouts for me. The serum texture is liquidy, a cross between an essence water and a serum. It is very thin but more viscous than water. It glides on smooth and absorbs instantly. The moisturizer is light, smooth and silky. After applying these, my skin completely absorbs the products. My skin feels silky and unbelievably smooth. There is a strong ginseng scent in these products which creates a zen-like spa experience. So far, after using the trial set for several days, my skin is feeling smoother and firmer. Iu2019d need to try the larger size to see longer term results.

This self-care trial skincare kit is nothing short of amazing. It's a comprehensive set that has truly transformed my skincare routine. Iu2019m loving this travel kit by Sulwhasoo. I bring the 4 step kit with me everywhere I travel and itu2019s helped my dull skin so much. The cleansing oil gets rid of all the dirt and makeup. Then the serum and cream has helped keep my skin soft.

reviews.review_title: Great way to try and test the benefits!
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Sulwhasoo First Care Trial Kit, and I must say it left a lasting impression. The kit includes several key products, each with its own unique benefits. 1. Gentle Cleansing Oil: The cleansing oil is incredibly effective at removing makeup and impurities. It feels light on the skin and doesn't leave any greasy residue. 2. Gentle Cleansing Foam: The cleansing foam complements the cleansing oil perfectly. It left my skin feeling refreshed and clean without any dryness. 3. First Care Activating Serum VI: This serum is the star of the kit. It preps the skin for subsequent products, and I noticed a visible improvement in the overall texture and radiance of my skin after just a few uses. 4. Concentrated Ginseng Renewing Cream: This cream is luxurious and provides deep hydration. It made my skin feel plump and nourished, and the ginseng extract is a great anti-aging ingredient. The Sulwhasoo First Care Trial Kit offers a well-rounded skincare routine. While the products may seem on the pricier side, they're worth the investment for the noticeable improvement in skin quality. This kit is an excellent way to experience Sulwhasoo's premium products and see the benefits for yourself.

I like the cute little bottles! The actual products worked great for my skin, it makes me want to order a full sizes now. My skin looks and feels wonderful and bright and hydrated! Go ahead and give it a try!

reviews.review_title: Great trial set for the price
reviews.review_text: I love this trial set. The Facial cleansing oil and toner leave my skin feeling very moisturized and not dry and tight, which I truly appreciate. The serum and cream are lightweight and easy absorbed into the skin and don't feel heavy or sticky/tacky. Everything in the set is lightly scented and not overpowering. After use, my skin looks and feels very soft and moisturized with a healthy glow. My skin feels much healthier since I have started using this routine.

I love this kit! The serum is my favorite and it keeps my skin so hydrated and moisturized. I always take this traveling with me so Iu2019m glad theyu2019re all tsa friendly. The cream absorbs so well and my skin looks plump after.

What a cute gift for people who love giving gift sets. I think this is great even if you arenu2019t going to give it to someone else. Itu2019s a good introduction to the brand while being so cute! Love it. :)

Itu2019s a great starter set to tryout the products for the first time.  The cleansing oil removes makeup nice and easy. Cleanser is gentle and hydrating, doesnu2019t feel dry.  Love the first serum, itu2019s a must have for me.

The serum in this set is amazing and itu2019s already my second bottle. Itu2019s  great to try the other products in the line as well. Though the trail sizes are small itu2019s still big enough for you to form a nice opinion on them. In addition to the serum, the gentle foaming cleanser is such a winner. It doesnu2019t strip my skin in the slightest. I will be purchasing the full size.

I just love this Sulwhasoo trial kit.   Gentle Cleansing Oil - It lifted all that makeup, mascara, and sunscreen off my face with just a few passes of light massaging. It rinses away pretty well. It smells absolutely perfect, at least to my taste. Sulwhasoo Gentle Cleansing Foam - The texture is great u2013 liquid enough to smooth over my face without pulling at my skin. It foams up slightly, but not as much as traditional foam cleansers. After rinsing it, my skin is soft and smooth. It does not feel stripped of moisture.  Sulwhasoo Activating Serum Review - It's a Lightweight and incredibly absorbent serum. The golden elixir is lightweight and runny; it melts quickly into the skin, dries to the touch within minutes, and leaves zero residues behind. With that said, this serum softened my skin, and it definitely improved the absorption of subsequent products.  Sulwhasoo Concentrated Renewing Ginseng Cream - Unlike most creamy moisturizers, the texture of the cream isnu2019t thick. When you scoop it out, it isnu2019t solid, but a little runny and liquid. It is almost like a thicker emulsion. It feels like a cream blended with oil. I wake up the next morning with soft, moisturized skin. But I find that after a week of using this cream, day and night, my skin seems to be re-balanced. It feels softer. It feels smoother. The other thing I noticed also, is that my skin appears to be stronger. I also find that my skin does not turn red, or look as red and patchy even in our hot weather.

This discovery set is the perfect thing to get when you want to discover this brand. I love how it gives you a little bit of everything to try. I would highly recommend to all my family and friends. It is also very travel friendly.

This is an amazing kit that has some of the best Sulwhasoo products! Great value kit that can be a perfect gift. I have used the first care serum before and found the cleansing oil and cleanser great as well! Suitable for all skin type!

reviews.review_title: Skincare That Matches My Taste ud83eudde1
reviews.review_text: As a beauty content creator, I am no stranger to Sulwhasoo. All four are deluxe sample/travel sizes and the serum by far seems to be the largest. I do wish the renewing cream was a little larger, it is 5ml or 0.16 fluid ounces. ud83eudde1  I have seen Sulwhasoo all over the place and personally enjoy luxury skincare, so I was super excited to snag this trial kit! All four skincare products have this really beautiful, light fragrance that I really like, and all are very gentle on my skin. I have dry, maturing skin and recently had irritation from another brand I tried out. I was really happy that this Sulwhasoo First Care Trial was so gentle that it actually has soothed my skin back to normal. ud83eudde1  This trial care kit helps with Dryness, Dullness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity, all of which are skin concerns of mine. I am really loving how my skin is feeling, looking and smelling from adding these four products into my daily skincare routine. I would definitely love to have them all in full size and try much more from Sulwhasoo. This skincare is definitely luxury and a brand I would love to continue to use. ud83eudde1

I love this set because itu2019s a good introduction to sulwahsoo for beginners and itu2019s a good value set! I think this is great for anyone who is into skincare. I think the packaging is so cute. Gifted by sulwahsoo.

This is the perfect kit to use if you want to try the brand for the first time, or you need to travel. I absolutely love the serum! And you get a full ounce of it, so you really do have time to see how it works.

Always live this brand. I brought the serum full size before and it really help my skin improve. This set is very useful for me on my nighttime routine than just applying the serum! The cream is so moisturizing even though itu2019s so small

I love trial kits and this one from Sulwhasoo is quite luxurious. It includes everything you need for a complete skincare routine with a cleansing oil, foam cleanser, serum, and cream. This routine makes my skin feel so amazing and moisturized.

This kit looks incredibly cute, I loved the packaging! I have tried the cleansers so far and they are amazing for my dry skin since they do not strip your skin, I will keep using the cream and see if I notice any difference.

I am so in love with this set!! It makes it a great introduction to the brand and a full skincare routine and see if the products work for your skin before compromising to buy them full size. This was my first time trying this brand and I will say I am very pleased with it. Itu2019s still too early for me to say Iu2019ve been big changes in my skin but one thing I have noticed is that my skin is glowing. Canu2019t wait to see more improvements in my skin.

Iu2019ve heard nothing but great things about this brand and these products. This was the perfect way for me to test them out. I was amazed to say the least! My favorites were the cleansing foam and the moisturizer. I definitely recommend to anyone wanting to test out some new skincare! The packaging is amazing as well!

I was impressed with how amazing the First Care Activating Serum felt on my skin after application. Itu2019s pretty lightweight, but for me it left my skin feeling instantly refreshed and rejuvenated. Truly delightful, and I could instantly feel the hydration and suppleness. Overall, the post-application experience was a highlight, making the kit a pleasurable addition to my skincare routine.  The kit provides an excellent introduction to Sulwhasoo's skincare products, some of which I hadnu2019t tried until this set, but definitely makes the serum the star.

This set is amazing! Everything you need for soft clean skin! I have combination skin and can get dry spots. The oil softens my skins right away and the cleanser cleans my skin without drying it out. I love the moisturizer too!

This is such a fantastic kit for people who are new to the brand and I love that the star of the show is the First Care Activating Serum, which is by far my favorite from the brand. Although these are miniatures, they still feel luxe and thereu2019s definitely enough product to get good use out of it!

I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review.   I love this complete trial set as I get to test it before purchasing the whole set.   The Gentle Cleansing Oil is very effective in removing the makeup completely. After emulsifying it and rinsing with lukewarm water, my face felt clean. I usually would have breakout from cleansing oil, however my skin loves this and feels moisturized.  I followed up with second face cleansing using the Gentle Cleansing Foam. It has a very light scent, leaves my face feeling clean without feeling dry.   The 3rd step is using the cult-favorite First Care Activating Serum VI. I apply the serum to damp skin and pat it down. I feel itu2019s a very light, smooth serum and absorbs easily. I have not used it long enough to see if it makes any improvements to my fine lines.   Lastly, I warm the Concentrated Ginseng Renewing Cream between your fingertips and gently press into the skin. This moisturizer is rich but lightweight at the same time. I feel it is silky soft  leaving my skin smoother and healthier looking. I have not tried it long enough to see if it improves on my fine lines or skin elasticity.  Overall, I love this set as my skin feels pampered after all the steps, like I just had a spa. I would definitely repurchase this again as a gift.

reviews.review_title: My new go to for skincare
reviews.review_text: I have been so excited to try this brand out! You can really feel the quality with this it feels like no other skincare Iu2019ve tried before. After useing this for just a few days there is a visible diffrence I have always been skeptical with useing skincare like does it really even do anything? With this I can feel and see the difference in my face for the first time ever! I love this and highly recommend this brand!

I think this set is a perfect way to try a new brand, or explore a few products you havenu2019t tried before. It includes just about everything you need for a basic skincare routine and is also absolutely perfect for travel (maybe with the exception of serum that happens to be half of a full size and still comes in a beautiful quality heavy glass bottle). Both cleansing oil and foam do a great job removing makeup and dirt without drying out the skin, the serum is incredibly lightweight and absorbs instantly, and the cream, that happens to be my favorite, is incredibly rich and nourishing. Definitely going to be gifting this set to s few people this holiday season.

If you want high quality skincare sulwhasoo is it. This set includes so many favorites for me. The first step serum really helps me keep my moisture barrier strong and makes me look younger. This is one of its kind in skincare. The cleansing oil helps to remove my makeup quick and flawless and the cleansing foam is soothing and gentle on my sensitive skin. Lastly the moisturizer really hydrates my skin and best of all really helps my wrinkles look so much less defined and keeps me looking young and beautiful.

This is an awesome kit ! The sizes are pretty decent (except the renewing cream, thatu2019s kind of tiny and wish it were a bit bigger). Otherwise, itu2019s a great way to test out the brand on a budget! The sizes are big enough to use for a few weeks (to test out products) or for travel (if you already know you love them). I think the packaging is really cute and makes for a perfect gift (to someone else or yourself). Itu2019s nearly a full routine (just missing an eye cream). I think the value of this is pretty good considering what it comes with. I wish the concentrated ginseng renewing serum was included to go with the cream since that one is my favorite! But the first care activated serum is great too. Overall great value for the luxury brand !

This was my first time trying any product from Sulwhasso, and I'm definitely not disappointed. I have sensitive, acne-prone skin, and my skin didn't get irritated, nor did it break out at all. These products are super gentle and effective. I really enjoyed the serum. It left my skin feeling so soft.

Wow! Iu2019ve always heard great things about this brand, so I finally tried it!!!! I started with this starter kit (to make sure the hype is really worth it) and YESSSS GIRL it is! I was concerned after hearing some react differently to the oil cleanser, but luckily it didnu2019t break me out - instead it just made my skin so soft and clean!!! I love everything about this set. I love that it comes with all four staples. Iu2019d definitely recommend!!! Would make a great Christmas present too!!!!

I am a huge skin care advocate and I am in love with the first care trial kit. First of all I already use 3 out of the 4 items religiously. I am in love with the texture and my skin soaks up the ingredients right away. This makes my skin look like it's got a filter on. I have dry skin and it makes the dry patches disappear.

I've tried the first care serum before and loved it so I was extra excited for this set, and it does not disappoint!  The products work great for my dry skin and help soothe any side effects from my retinol use. It's a great trial set if you want an introduction to the brand. I would recommend it.

After trying out this set, I have to say, I absolutely love it! The products inside are just the right size to give them each a fair shot and get a good understanding of if youu2019ll like them or not. The products are also so light weight and not one of them feel sticky any/or heavy on my face. I have already noticed a difference in my skin as compared to before I used these products. I definitely recommend!

I have been wanting to try Sulwhasoo for a while now and love that this kit comes with 4 good sized samples. The Gentle Cleansing Oil just melts away your makeup and the Gentle Cleansing Foam cleans away all the dirt and impurities off your face. The Activating Serum comes in a large glass jar that will last a long time. It has a pump so you can easily get the perfect amount of serum that you need. It lightly scented and not overpowering. The Ginseng Renewing Cream also has a light scent and is very thick and creamy. This left my face feeling so hydrated and soft. I love that you can try these before you make a purchase on the full size bottles.

This serum and moisturizer melt into my skin almost instantly. It feels light weight and smooth. I have been using this in the morning and at night. I really like this product. I also love the high quality packaging.

I love sulwhasoo and super happy they now have this discovery set! It is great for traveling. I really like the first care serum and how it makes my skin soft and smooth. The cleanser and face cream work great as well!

I love this kit. It has all my favourites like cleansing oil and ginseng renewing cream. I have combination skin and these products hydrates my skin really well and makes my skin super soft afterwards! Loving it

The serum is exceptional, boasting a subtle ginger scent and quickly absorbing into the skin. Initially, it may feel a bit sticky, but once fully absorbed, there is no stickiness anymore. Perfect gift for your love ones

Although this set is trial size, the serum comes with a glass bottle, giving it an elegant and expensive appearance. The serum is exceptional, featuring a subtle ginger scent and quickly absorbing into the skin.

This is such a great kit! I love the First Care Activating Serum that this kit contains, I have the full size of it but was interested in trying other products from Sulwhasoo. The cleansing oil was a great first step in my double cleansing routine, it left my skin feeling hydrated. I followed it up with the cleansing foam which was gentle and didnu2019t dry out my skin. The renewing cream was lovely, it was hydrating and my skin didnu2019t look as dull. Such a great kit for anyone looking to explore the brand!

I was gifted the Sulwhasoo First Care Trial Kit. I am very particular about what I use on my skin. I started with the Gentle Cleansing Oil which I applied with my finger tips, concentrating around my eyes. It removed all of my makeup. The Gentle Cleansing Foam I used next to remove the oil and any traces of the day. I then applied to First care activating Serum followed by the Concentrated Renewing Cream. I repeated this ritual for 5 days. My skin looks beautiful. I will be purchasing the full sizes.

This kit is filled with amazing products that I absolutely love. It would be a perfect holiday gift and I am getting multiple sets. It's also a great way to try them out if you've never used them. I have used the full-sized versions for a long time and can vouch for their quality. These products make my skin feel smooth and moisturized without being greasy. The texture of the products is fantastic and they have a pleasant, clean scent that is not overpowering.

What a cute kit! This is so perfect for familiarizing oneself with this line. It will be great for traveling too. The cleansing oil easily took off my waterproof mascara and the foam cleanser left my skin feeling clean and balanced. The serum and cream have been a staple for me for a reason. They feel so light on my skin but also very hydrated and softly glowy.

I love this kit. Itu2019s the perfect way to try all of these formulas and see how it works for my skin before committing to the full size products. It includes everything that you need for a nourishing skincare routine and the formulas are all so gentle on my sensitive combo skin. It also makes the perfect gift!

I have always wanted to try this brand and this is the perfect set to do just that! Affordable and full of their bestsellers. Love the oil cleanser and will definitely repurchase in a full size. Products leave my skin feeling so clean and fresh. Highly recommend

The Sulwhasoo First Care Trial Kit comes in very giftable packaging for skincare lover friends during the upcoming holiday season. I like how the products in this kit takes care of removing my makeup, cleansing my face, and hydrating plus moisturizing my face. My skin looks more radiant and youthful.

reviews.review_title: Super nice kit with great value
reviews.review_text: This trial kit is the best way to try this brand! So affordable and full of goodies. My favorite product here is the iconic and effective first activating serum. I definitely will be purchasing full size after trying those bestselling minis.

I received this product in exchange for my honest review. This is such an amazing gift especially for someone who likes to take care of their skin. I love how gentle and effective the cleanser is in combination with the other products

this set is so amazing! if you haven't had the chance to try sulwhasoo, this gets you a full routine. the cleansing duo deeply cleanses without stripping my skin. following up with the serum and cream... oh my gosh my skin looks + feels so incredibly plump and healthy!!! dry acne prone girlie approved too <3

I was pleasantly surprised by this set! The oil cleanser was very light and didnu2019t feel heavy or gross like other oil cleansers Iu2019ve tried and it took off my mascara easily. The foam cleanser was nice and removed the oil and didnu2019t leave my skin feeling tight and dry. The serum was my favorite in the set, my skin felt baby smooth and I could definetly see myself purchasing this by itself. The cream was nice but nothing stuck out to me in particular.

I received something in exchange for this post from Sulwhasoo A daily essential collection featuring Sulwhasoo's bestselling skin heroes, including the cult-favorite First Care Activating Serum VI. Designed as a sampler of the Sulwhasoo skincare ritual, this ultra-luxe kit features top-selling formulations that help gently cleanse, hydrate, and visibly firm for healthy, youthful-looking skin. Great holidays gift set! Great travel set! Great for Dryness, Dullness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity! I use this cleansing oil to remove makeup, it can remove the makeup quickly! Follow with cleaner! They are perfect match by use together for double cleansing! Won't clog the pores and cause acne on my skin! I had been using a few bottles of this serum! This serum is not a watery texture! Following with the cream is lightweight texture! I am enjoying the red ginseng smell when I applying on my face, my skin feels silky, hydrating and moisturizing!

This is a great set to try more than one of their products or to gift. Itu2019s perfect size for if you are traveling as well. It leaves my skin feeling hydrated. And I really enjoyed the wash as well didnu2019t leave my skin dirty nor dry.

this set is just amazing! it has everything you need for an amazing korean skincare routine and it makes me feel so pampered and luxurious when I use these! It is a really relaxing experience and Iu2019m loving the results

Sulwhasoo came out with this amazing new set u201cfirst care trial setu201d. I was very excited to give this a try and have heard good things about this brand. I definitely had to see it for myself. I love this 4 step routine. My skin feels healthier and softer after using.

Sulwhasoo's First Care Trial Kit is a fantastic entry into Korean skincare. With a touch of luxury, it offers a taste of the brand's herbal-based excellence, leaving skin refreshed and hydrated. A great way to explore K-beauty.

This is the perfect starter kit if you want to try out Sulwhasoo! It comes with everything you need for your night time routine a cleaning oil that will melt your makeup and mascara right off following with the gentle cleanser to get rid of any excess and then the serum which smells so good and feels absolutely amazing and the last step is the cream which feels super luxurious on your skin! You will feel absolutely refreshed and renewed after all these steps ! I would purchase this again !

This is the best skincare sample set that I've received in a very long time! Every product in this set is so amazing that it's hard to even put into words! I've really been dying to try Sulwhasoo, and I'm incredibly impressed! Each product in this routine has such a great texture (and I'm super picky with textures), and they seriously made my skin feel amazing and softer than ever! I cannot wait to try even more awesomeness from Sulwhasoo!

I absolutely adore Sulwashoo and was happy to see it listed on Sephoras website!! The first care trial kit is the best and comes with so many different products that are all amazing! After using my skin feels so soft and clean which is great!

This  sample set of the Sulwhasoo skincare is the perfect way to try their products., This ultra-luxe kit that helps gently cleanse, hydrate, and visibly firm and give my skin a healthy and youthful glow. My skin is so soft and itu2019s usually very dry. Itu2019s the perfect set to learn a skincare routine as well

I've heard great things about this brand and was excited to finally try out their products and I wasn't disappointed at all. This is such a great starter kit to test on my skin to see if it reacts well and my skin pretty much soaked up every bit of product applied. I definitely want to purchase the full size as soon as I can (looking at you sephora sale!).

I really love this kit, because it gives me the opportunity to try out all these different products at such a great price point. I have been using the cleansing oil to remove any make up or SPF from throughout the day. And the moisturizer is so hydrating, perfect for these cooler months!

My first ever sulwhasoo products honestly I am dazzled can see why everyone loves this authentic genuine brand! Love that itu2019s nature itself in a bottle and that everything is so unique and well thought out!

[Gifted by Sulwhasoo] This set is really great for gift giving or figuring out if the Sulwhasoo First Care line works for you. I found it to be really great value since the toner alone is worth about $50. I also really enjoyed how calming and gentle the cleanser was. It worked really effectively with the other products.

This is such a nice trial set. If you want to try it before buying, itu2019s a nice size to see if you like it and if it works for you. I live sulwhasoo, especially the cream. A little goes a long way. My skin looks amazing after using these products. Will definitely get regular sizes

The first care trial kit, is impeccable! This minis are great not only to explore the products this brand has to offer but are great to utilize if you are traveling. This made my skin feel smooth and restore its barrier.

Sulwasoo is such an underrated korean beauty brand! I love everything in this set. The serum works so well at plumping they skin and producing a more hydrated, youthful look. I love the two cleansers; such great cleansers that clean skin and makeup well for a two step cleanse. The renewing cream left my skin more hydrated and moisturized and wore super well under makeup. This is an amazing set for anyone who wants to introduce themselves to Sulwasoo products! I highly recommend this set!

I absolutely love these products! The size is great to get to see the full effects of them, before committing to the full sizes. I love the way they made my skin feel, I have sensitive skin but my skin felt so hydrated and soothed with these! Iu2019m so excited to keep using them.

This kit is a perfect sampler for the sulwahsoo products.  I like that I can try these in trial size before buying the full size to see if it works.  My skin is loving it and it also absorbs well and makes my skin smooth and plump!

This trial kit is a great set to get to know Sulwhasoo. The products are enough for about two weeks, except the Concentrated Ginseng Renewing Cream, which only has 5 ml. I have dry skin and am pleased with all four products.

I have loved every Sulwhasoo product Iu2019ve tried and I was so excited to try a complete regimen from the brand. The cleanser is gentle but effective, and the serum makes my skin so glowy and nourished!

I do wish that the products were a bit bigger in this set I was only able to use just a few times before running out I love this brand but this set might not be worth it if you want to see more results

This is a great kit if you want to try the brand before buying in large quantity. Comes with cleanser, serum and moisturizer.I love sulwhasoo products so this kit is perfect for me. Also very much travel friendly. You can also gift this to someone even packaging is so cute. Great products as well

How amazing is this box!!! A lot of wonderful products for my skin. I tried once the serum and it was amazing!! The smell is very delicious and my skin is very soft, shiny and fine lines almost disappear.

reviews.review_title: All you need for a good skin care!
reviews.review_text: I am the biggest fan of Sulwhasoo products and I was so happy to try this First care trial kit and let me tell you! It is amazing! This set includes everything you need for a hood looking skin. My face is glowing now. The scent is amazing. The quality of the products are top line!

Iu2019ve really enjoyed using this First Care Trial Kit. Iu2019ve used most of these products in the past and I really enjoy how well the Activating Serum works to hydrate my dry skin. I also find the cleansing product soothing to use.
